maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Limit of home detail pages to be scraped

simple.title: Simple results
simple.description: Return only a subset of possible result attributes.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs that will be crawled.
startUrls.sectionDescription: You can use a direct URL or ZPID instead of simple search.

zpids.title: Zillow home IDs
zpids.description: List of ZPIDs that will be scraped.

zipcodes.title: US Zipcodes
zipcodes.description: List of zipcodes that will be scraped. Notice that this can take a lot of time to complete!

maxLevel.title: Max zoom level
maxLevel.description: Maximum map splitting level. The bigger number is set, the longer the scrape will take

minDate.title: Minimum date
minDate.description: Oldest date allowed in results. Can use specific dates, such as YYYY-MM-DD or relative ones, like '1 month' or '2 days'

maxDate.title: Maximum date
maxDate.description: Newest date allowed in results. Can use specific dates, such as YYYY-MM-DD or relative ones, like '1 month' or '2 days'

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy. But you can also use your own proxies or no proxy

maxRetries.title: Max retries
maxRetries.description: How many retries until the scraper should give up

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend output function
extendOutputFunction.description: Extend the output item to contain more fields. The raw data is present in the 'data' variable.
extendOutputFunction.sectionDescription: You can change the output of the items for your dataset here, or add additional behavior on the scraper.

extendScraperFunction.title: Extend Scraper Function
extendScraperFunction.description: Advanced function that allows you to extend the default scraper functionality, allowing you to manually perform actions on the page

customData.title: Custom data
customData.description: Any data that you want to have available inside the Extend Output/Scraper Function
